rt - package rt
Core classes and interfaces for an educational ray tracer.
rt.basicscenes - package rt.basicscenes
Implementations of the abstract class Scene.
rt.cameras - package rt.cameras
Implementations of the Camera interface.

Implementations of the Film interface.

Implementations of the Integrator interface.
rt.intersectables - package rt.intersectables
Implementations of the Intersectable interface.
rt.lightsources - package rt.lightsources
Implementations of the LightGeometry interface.
rt.materials - package rt.materials
Implementations of the Material interface.
rt.samplers - package rt.samplers
Implementations of the Sampler interface.
rt.test - package rt.test
 
rt.testscenes - package rt.testscenes
Simple test scenes to compare your renderer to a reference solution.

Implementations of the Tonemapper interface.
